query:
UPDATE submissions 
SET artist_image = CASE 
  WHEN artist_name = 'The Midnight Runners' THEN '/assets/vibe-atars/energetic-vibe.png'
  WHEN artist_name = 'Luna Eclipse' THEN '/assets/vibe-atars/cosmic-vibe.png'
  WHEN artist_name = 'Cosmic Waves' THEN '/assets/vibe-atars/chill-vibe.png'
  WHEN artist_name = 'Neon Pulse' THEN '/assets/vibe-atars/edgy-vibe.png'
  WHEN artist_name = 'Spectrum Shift' THEN '/assets/vibe-atars/mysterious-vibe.png'
END
WHERE artist_name IN ('The Midnight Runners', 'Luna Eclipse', 'Cosmic Waves', 'Neon Pulse', 'Spectrum Shift');
